name: Poseidon
description:
Poseidon

is an underwater endless top-down shooter, where your "bullets" persist and can hurt you too! You have to manage the amount of bullets on screen whilst dispatching the endless swarm of pufferfish bent on destroying you.

  • Survive as long as possible. 
  • Shoot pufferfish until they blow up. (LMB)
  • Dash into pufferfish to knock them around or avoid damage. (SPACEBAR)
  • Eat three golden fish to unlock the ability to instantly clear the screen. (SPACEBAR)
  • Eat the fish that accumulate on screen before they overwhelm you! (RMB)

If you're interested in more of my projects or the source code of this project check the links below.
